input_text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to add an extra email address on linkedin?
input_text.Response A: To add an extra email address on LinkedIn, go to your profile, click on the 'Contact and Personal Info' tab, then click on the ‘Add email address’ button. Enter your new email address and click ‘Save’ to add it to your profile.
input_text.Response B:
Launch an Internet browser.
Head to LinkedIn.
Log into your LinkedIn account.
Go to the Review menu.
Access your Account settings.
Add an email address.
Exit the menu.
